section.name: Try Silverpeas easily
section.p:
We provide an easy way to try Silverpeas using Izpack with a pre-configured JBoss Server and an H2 Database.
You have to have a Java 6 JDK installed.
This version is not suitable for production !.

ol.li: Run the following command (or double click on the jar file) java -jar Silverpeas-5.4-installer.jar

When all has been installed, go to the bin directory under the installation directory and run the following scripts in that order
start_db.bat (thus starting the database).
silverpeas_start_jboss.cmd (to start Silverpeas)
Now you can open a browser to http://localhost:8000/silverpeas an login using the account SilverAdmin/SilverAdmin
